Meet the hiring team
Kanatip Kantiwong 
3rd
Principal Consultant at Nicoll Curtin - Software Engineering, Cloud, Automation
Job poster
Message
About the job
Our Big Tech client is hiring a Software Engineer (Frontend Focused) to help build and scale high-impact consumer products and internal platforms. You’ll work across the entire development lifecycle—from early technical design to implementation, testing, and release—while partnering closely with product, design, support, and other engineering teams. This role is suited for someone who enjoys solving complex technical problems and contributing to large, cross-functional projects.

Responsibilities
Work with Product, Design, Support, and other teams to shape and refine project requirements.
Build and test (unit and end-to-end) major product features while meeting delivery timelines.
Develop user interfaces, backend systems, and APIs using languages such as JavaScript, PHP/Hack, and Python.
Build large-scale consumer features and internal tools.
Follow strong engineering and release practices across the entire development process.
Partner with platform and operations teams to scale automated systems and infrastructure.

Minimum Qualifications
At least 2 years of full-time work experience. 
Experience owning full-stack projects through the entire SDLC.
Strong collaboration skills with the ability to work across different functions.
Ability to work with and influence senior engineers or technical leaders.
Proven history of delivering complex projects on schedule.
Experience driving large, cross-team engineering initiatives.
Proficiency with Git, Mercurial, or other distributed version control systems.
Experience with modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Vue, Angular, etc.).

Preferred Qualifications
Degree in Computer Science or another STEM discipline.
Experience building high-quality enterprise products.
Ability to write complex and efficient SQL queries.
Exposure to multiple programming languages in production environments.
Any background in support or operations work.
Experience building privacy-related or ads-focused products.

This is an initial 12-months full-time contract role that has visibility for a perm conversion.

About the company
Nicoll Curtin
351,680 followers
Follow
Staffing and Recruiting 51-200 employees 58 on LinkedIn
Nicoll Curtin is an award-winning recruitment company specialising in
technology and change verticals. We have been connecting outstanding
talent with sector-leading companies for over 25 years.

We recruit contract and permanent professionals on both a retained and contingency basis, and we also offer Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) services to a portfolio of global clients.

Key Facts About Our Team
- We attract, advise and build relationships with the most sought after talent.
- Language is not a barrier. Among us, we collectively speak 17 languages.
- We are committed to delivering a wide pool of talent. As an inclusive business, we aim to send at least one diverse CV in every three.
- We have 100% return business with our core clients.
- We’re a growing team, with new offices opened in Hong Kong in 2022, Ireland in 2023, and the Philippines in 2025.
- We have a LinkedIn following of over 300,000 and were featured in the Financial Times and eFinancial Careers in 2022, 2023, and 2025.
- We take pride in delivering an exceptional customer experience, reflected in our recent Net Promoter Scores: 70% from candidates and 89% from clients over the past six months.
